title: Episode 87 - Racism
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary:
In this episode, we examine the origin and structure of racism in America. How did racism develop in America and the west and what did it look like in the early Cold War. We examine how the development of slavery led to anti-black racism in the United States and how scientific thought about race changed America's perception on race relations over time.

For pictures for this episode and more go to our website at:  www.historyofthecoldwarpodcast.com/
